isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - ALCOHOL EVAPORATOR (BENDIX AE-1) - TYPE OF ALCOHOL

svcproc.title: TYPE OF ALCOHOL
svcproc.para: It is recommended that only pure alcohol be used in the air brake system. Certain types of alcohol and antifreeze solutions contain ingredients which leave residue or deteriorate parts in the air system.
